General.Name: Beijing Tongyizhong New Material Technology Corp
General.Description: Beijing Tongyizhong New Material Technology Corporation engages in the research and development, production, and sale of ultra-high molecular weight polyethylene (UHMWPE) fibers and composite materials in China and internationally. The company provides UHMWPE fibers for ropes, gloves, ballistics, cut-resistant, fishing lines, and pre-dyed. It also offers soft non-woven, rigid non-woven, cut and stab resistant, and double anti-material fabrics. In addition, it provides protective products, such as bulletproof helmets, plates, vehicle armors, and shields; explosion proof blankets; and body armors, as well as cut-resistance bags, cool-feeling fabrics, high-performance ropes, fishery products, and cut-resistant clothes. The company was incorporated in 1999 and is based in Beijing, China.
General.Address: No.17, Jingsheng South 2nd Street, Beijing, China
